item.title: Windows App Studio - Official Site
item.description: And if you want to advanced programming features, Windows App Studio generates your source code ready for Visual Studio - a feature no other app-builder tool provides.

item.title: Windows App Studio Sample App - Windows App Studio - Microsoft
item.description: Use the App Studio sample to create an app about a topic you care about with an About page, a collection, and links to Facebook, YouTube, Flickr, and Bing.

item.description: This is an example App built using Windows App Studio http://appstudio.windows.com . It displays many of the features available to App Studio users.

item.title: Develop Windows Store apps using Visual Studio 2012
item.description: You can build an app that runs on multiple Windows devices. If you target Windows 8.1 devices, you'll have one solution but you'll build two separate apps.
